title: Columbus Day Special Featuring EPC Dark Ritual and Don Pepin Black Lancero Cigars
itunes:title: Columbus Day Special Featuring EPC Dark Ritual and Don Pepin Black Lancero Cigars
description: This week we are paid a visit by Christopher Columbus as we smoke the EPC Dark Ritual from 2011 and Don Pepin Black Lancero Cigar from 2008. Plus News from Asylum, Old Fart Freddy, and the top Tweets of the week.
content:encoded: This week we are paid a visit by Christopher Columbus as we smoke the EPC Dark Ritual from 2011 and Don Pepin Black Lancero Cigar from 2008. Plus News from Asylum, Old Fart Freddy, and the top Tweets of the week.
